hero.headline: Connected global account to do business with the world

featureCards.description: One account for your bank payments in 35 currencies to and from 185 countries.

featureCards.title: Automate bookkeeping
featureCards.description: No more bank feeds and less bookkeeping. Relax as HedgeFlows auto-reconciles your paid bills and invoices in any currency.

valueProposition.heading: Finally. A global payments account that makes accounting easy.
valueProposition.body: Running a business shouldn't mean wasting hours on cross-border payments or managing currency surprises. No more unexpected FX costs, manual bookkeeping errors, and poorly integrated systems slow you down and hurt your bottom line.
bulletPoints: Pay or get paid in 35 currencies
Prebook guaranteed FX rates in advance
Import invoices from Xero, Quickbooks, etc.
Schedule payment runs with or without FX

competitivePositioning.heading: Cheaper than banks, smarter than Wise
competitivePositioning.subheading: Go further than with any other bank or platform and save more time and money with our prebookable FX rates, auto-reconciliations, and smart currency management.

qAndA.question: How to save money on FX with HedgeFlows?
qAndA.answer: HedgeFlows offers better exchange rates than most banks, but we don't stop there. We have also made it easy to prebook exchange rates when they are great for your business.

qAndA.question: Why prebook FX rates?
qAndA.answer: You avoid overpaying for hotel rooms and flights by booking them in advance. We make it easy to do the same for your invoices when you trade internationally. Book guaranteed exchange rates for your orders and invoices when you get them or when they work best for your business.

qAndA.question: What is different about your integrations?
qAndA.answer: Payment files and bank feeds are so last decade - slow and clunky. Connect you cloud-based ERP or accounting system to HedgeFlows and manage you payables and receivables in one seamless process in real-time.

steps.title: SIGN UP TO HEDGEFLOWS
steps.description: Sign up for free using your email address at app.hedgeflows.com/sign-up.

steps.title: CONNECT YOUR SYSTEMS
steps.description: Sync HedgeFlows with your ERP or accounting systems in a few easy clicks.

steps.title: REGISTER YOUR BUSINESS
steps.description: Register your business to start saving time and managing finances with HedgeFlows.

faq.question: What invoices can I pay via Hedgeflows?
faq.answer: HedgeFlows makes paying domestic or international invoices from systems such as Xero, NetSuite or Microsoft Dynamics Business Central easy and faultless. Once vendor invoices are authorised in your system, they appear in HedgeFlows, and you can simply choose the list of invoices you wish to pay. You can fund your payment run from your trusted bank account, and we automatically process any optional currency conversions, make correct transfers, send remittance emails and reconcile back to General Ledger for you!

faq.question: Do you have an approval process for payments?
faq.answer: Yes, HedgeFlows offers a customisable approval process with individual roles and limits to support your payment run needs.

faq.question: How safe are payments and funds handled by HedgeFlows?
faq.answer: FCA regulated, named accounts, safeguarded funds, automated sweeps to bank.

faq.question: Why is it safe to connect my ERP/account to HedgeFlows?
faq.answer: FCA regulated, Strong Customer Authentication, role-based access controls.

faq.question: I have an external accountant, can they use HedgeFlows?
faq.answer: Of course, we are working with the leading accountancy practices in the UK already and are helping make foreign currencies simpler for thousands of small businesses in the country. You keep control of the validation of foreign payments, while your accountant takes care of processing the invoices, cash management, and accounting tasks.

faq.question: Are payment runs made straight from my bank account?
faq.answer: HedgeFlows offers a range of solutions to process your payments. If your bank supports Open Banking services, you can rely on our robust payment initiation technology to make vendor payments straight from your bank by preparing your payment runs in HedgeFlows and securely authorising via Open Banking. Otherwise, you can also rely on our industry-leading payment infrastructure to process payments via your multi-currency payment accounts with HedgeFlows and simply fund them with a single transfer from your bank.

hero.headline: Expert FX risk management for CFOs who want clarity, not complexity
hero.subtitle: Most finance teams manage currency risk like driving in fog - they know something's out there, but can't see how big or how close. Let your facts, not market moves and emotions, drive your financial decisions.

ctas.text: See Your FX Risk Right Now

featureCards.title: Connect your data
featureCards.description: Connect your ERP, forecasting tools, or CRM in minutes to get real-time visibility into your actual currency exposures. No more guessing what your risk looks like - see it as it happens.

featureCards.title: See your FX risks
featureCards.description: Transform your raw data into clear risk insights. See exactly how much FX exposure you're carrying, what it means for your business, and when you should be concerned.

featureCards.title: Execute with confidence
featureCards.description: Implement hedging policy, get expert recommendations, then execute them easily. Embed them in your workflows and systems to manage treasury in 35 currencies.

sections.heading: Monitor FX risk without constant manual oversight
sections.body: No more nasty surprises. Connect your data, let us know your risk tolerance, and HedgeFlows will automatically monitor and alert you before it's too late to act.

sections.heading: Get the visibility to beat volatility
sections.body: Go beyond the FX 'budget buffer' on projects. Gain critical early visibility of your entire pipeline and currency needs, including projected cash flows through integrations with software like NetSuite & HubSpot, and stay one step ahead.

sections.heading: Add integrations for the full FX picture
sections.body: Connect your accounting, ERP, FP&A and other tools and see and quantify your risks as soon as they arise.

sections.heading: Manage currencies, don't gamble on them
sections.body: Easily execute risk management best practices with help from our experts and guidance from our especially-trained AI - Currency Co-pilot.
sections.note: View some of the Hedging workflows from our award-winning FX management platform:

sections.heading: Build a hedging strategy to suit your business
sections.body: Get a free upfront consultation with our experts to discuss risk and plan an FX risk management process that's right for the industry, size and specific needs of your business. Then use our intuitive tools and workflows to implement it.

security.heading: Bank-grade security
security.subheading: Connect securely to your banks and ERP systems
security.body: HedgeFlows is an FCA-regulated institution that processes millions in currency payments and transactions every day. We treat your data with the utmost care and protect it from cyber threats and unauthorised access with role-based access controls and multi-factor authentication.

footer.companyInfo: HedgeFlows Ltd, a company registered in England with company number 12689184, is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority as an Authorised Payment Institution (Firm Reference Number: 1008699) for the provision of payment services under the Payment Service Regulations 2017.
